page.title: 15COMMUNITY ORGANISATIONS (2)
page.content: As well as the Community Centres there are the local sports facilities. The Saffron Lane Sports Stadium has an all-weather athletics track as well as a world class cycling track. It is also home for the 'Leicester Panthers' American Football Team. Grace Road is home for the Leicestershire County Cricket Club. Two purpose built Sports Halls have been built at Aylestone Swimming Bath and Southfields Community Centre, which provide many facilities including badminton, table tennis, basketball, 5-a-side football and gymnastics. The Aylestone Bath is also home for the British Long Distance Swimming Association. Many factories have their own private sports grounds for football and cricket and other private sports facilities exist for Judo, Rugby & Table Tennis.
